bibl.title: A Festival of Isis in Rome under the Christian Emperors of the 4th Century.
bibl.publisher: Institute of Numismatics and Archaeology of the Pazmany-University
bibl.note: Lecture given at the International Congress of the Numismatists, London, 1936.
Alföldi Andreas, A Festival of Isis in Rome under the Christian Emperors of the 4th Century.
Budapest, Institute of Numismatics and Archaeology of the Pazmany-University - Leipzig, Harrassowitz, 1937, 4°, 95 pp., 20 pll.
